patched_yaml:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: demo-server
  name: demo-server
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: demo-server
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: demo-server
        room: bjzt
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: docker.io/swiftabc/cncamp-lilong-2022-02-28-d43c98c:stable
        name: demo-server
        command:
        - /http-server
        args:
        - --logtostderr=true
        - --config=file:////config/mod8.ini
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /config
          name: web-conf
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 200Mi
          requests:
            memory: 100Mi
        ports:
        - containerPort: 1880
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 1880
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 1880
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          privileged: false
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      volumes:
      - name: web-conf
        configMap:
          name: web-config

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: demo-server
  name: demo-server
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: demo-server
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: demo-server
        room: bjzt
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: docker.io/swiftabc/cncamp-lilong-2022-02-28-d43c98c:stable
        name: demo-server
        command:
        - /http-server
        args:
        - --logtostderr=true
        - --config=file:////config/mod8.ini
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /config
          name: web-conf
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 200Mi
            cpu: 500m
          requests:
            memory: 100Mi
            cpu: 100m
        ports:
        - containerPort: 1880
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 1880
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 1880
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        securityContext:
          privileged: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      volumes:
      - name: web-conf
        configMap:
          name: web-config

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: 100mb-of-logs
spec:
  containers:
  - name: succeeded
    image: alpine:3.4
    command:
    - /bin/sh
    - -c
    - echo start----; base64 /dev/urandom | head -c 10000000; echo ----end
    securityContext:
      readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
      privileged: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - NET_RAW
        - NET_ADMIN
        - SYS_ADMIN
        - SYS_MODULE
        - SYS_PTRACE
        - SYS_CHROOT
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: ekc-operator
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: ekc-operator
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: ekc-operator
    spec:
      serviceAccountName: ekco
      containers:
      - name: ekc-operator
        image: replicated/ekco:v0.2.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        command:
        - /usr/bin/ekco
        - operator
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 64Mi
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 128Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - name: ekco-config
          mountPath: /etc/ekco
          readOnly: true
        - name: certificates-dir
          mountPath: /etc/kubernetes/pki
          readOnly: true
        securityContext:
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          privileged: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      volumes:
      - name: ekco-config
        configMap:
          name: ekco-config
      - name: certificates-dir
        hostPath:
          path: /etc/kubernetes/pki
          type: Directory

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: ekc-operator
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: ekc-operator
  template:
    metadata:

    spec:
      serviceAccountName: ekco
      containers:
      - name: ekc-operator
        image: replicated/ekco:v0.2.0

        command:
        - /usr/bin/ekco
        - operator
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 64Mi
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 128Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - name: ekco-config
          mountPath: /etc/ekco
          readOnly: true
        - name: certificates-dir
          mountPath: /etc/kubernetes/pki
          readOnly: true
        securityContext:
          runAsNonRoot: true
          privileged: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      volumes:
      - name: ekco-config
        configMap:
          name: ekco-config
      - name: certificates-dir
        hostPath:
          path: /etc/kubernetes/pki
          type: Directory

apiVersion: v1
kind: ReplicationController
metadata:
  labels:
    db: rethinkdb
  name: rethinkdb-replica-2
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    db: rethinkdb
    role: replica
    instance: two
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        db: rethinkdb
        role: replica
        instance: two
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: us.gcr.io/dray-app/rethinkdb:2.3.2
        command:
        - /usr/bin/run.sh
        - --server-name
        - replica_2
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: rethinkdb
        env:
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: admin-port
        - containerPort: 28015
          name: driver-port
        - containerPort: 29015
          name: cluster-port
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data
          name: rethinkdb-storage
        securityContext:
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          privileged: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      volumes:
      - gcePersistentDisk:
          fsType: ext4
          pdName: rethinkdb-storage-stage-2
        name: rethinkdb-storage

apiVersion: v1
kind: ReplicationController
metadata:
  name: heapster-v9
  namespace: kube-system
  labels:
    k8s-app: heapster
    version: v9
    kubernetes.io/cluster-service: 'true'
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    k8s-app: heapster
    version: v9
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        k8s-app: heapster
        version: v9
        kubernetes.io/cluster-service: 'true'
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: gcr.io/google_containers/heapster:v0.18.1
        name: heapster
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 300Mi
        command:
        - /heapster
        - --source=kubernetes:''
        - --sink=gcl
        - --sink=gcmautoscaling
        - --sink=influxdb:http://monitoring-influxdb:8086
        - --sink_frequency=2m
        volumeMounts:
        - name: ssl-certs
          mountPath: /etc/ssl/certs
          readOnly: true
        securityContext:
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          privileged: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      volumes:
      - name: ssl-certs
        hostPath:
          path: /etc/ssl/certs
